website_summaries.verdict: The unlocked HTC 10 is the best Android phone for audiophiles and it offers plenty for everyone else too. This could be HTC's big comeback.
cons: Wi-Fi performance is a bit slow
Some camera focus issues in low light

customer_reviews.title: Not NEW as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This took forever to arrive and when it did the battery only lasted a few hours and could be seeing dying immediately after unplugging. I contacted htc who informed me the serial number was not new as advertised but had been registered two years previously. I returned to seller and received a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: buddy

customer_reviews.title: I love HTC phones as they don't have the plastic feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I love HTC phones as they don't have the plastic feel and the last 3 I had just worked. only disappointing thing is that the vibrator is very subtle and hard to hear notice. ( I am used to only having my phone in vibrate mode). Also, it only runs Android 8 and not 8.1 and have no security update recently. So hardware top dollar but software could be worked on.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Thorup

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking phone.
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered sooner than I thought wich was very good as it was for my wife birthday. I was a bit concerned when we but it on charge it became very hot, then after the first charge it was ok. But again this morning when my but it on charge it got very hot again, is this normal? I am also finding it very hard to get a cover for it, I ordered a cover for a HTC 10 but it was to big this model cold you please help me tell me the correct cover for it many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Keith.r

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone based largely on great reviews. I have now had and used the phone for some time and it has surpassed my expectations. It's simple to set up and I'm very pleased with it. I've had an HTC phone before but this is in a different league. It's gets my vote every time.
customer_reviews.author: rach4ever

customer_reviews.title: excellent phone in every way
customer_reviews.text: everything i'd hoped for a truly excellent phone in every way - had the HTC 8 before for 3 years and this easily tops that which was already a superb phone. It feel premium and solid - Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Decent camera but not really satisfied overall.
customer_reviews.text: Happy that I could upgrade to Oreo but unhappy about the price and very unhappy that after 18 months (in March 2019) it suffers from random reboots especially when the battery is lower than 40%. Decent camera though.
customer_reviews.author: Please provide a pen name.

customer_reviews.title: absolutely stunning
customer_reviews.text: I had a HTC M8, missed it so much tried lots to replace it nothing comes close to it but this, basically an upgraded HTC M8. amazing
customer_reviews.author: Benny_london

customer_reviews.title: Does me fine. Battery lasts 24 hours with a fair bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Does me fine. Battery lasts 24 hours with a fair bit of GPS and internet usage (if shitch the brightness down to 50%). Recently upgraded to Oreo which is a step back as can no longer have separate notification tones for email and texts.
customer_reviews.author: Des

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: I like everything there is withe HTC 10 it is an excellent mobile phone
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant smart phone fast delivery thank
customer_reviews.text: I always have HTC they never let me down and this one has just exceeded my expectations. Brilliant smart phone fast delivery thank you
customer_reviews.author: Simi

customer_reviews.title: Htc
customer_reviews.text: Good mobile,works great came well packaged. only gripe with how long it took for delivery
customer_reviews.author: wayne osborne

customer_reviews.title: Hard work
customer_reviews.text: Find this phoned hard to use not as good as samsung would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: s windle

customer_reviews.title: Great Android phone!
customer_reviews.text: My third HTC phone. The specification gets better and better as time passes. Great to be up to speed again as my previous phone's storage had been fully used and I couldn't update any app.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Grieve

customer_reviews.title: excellent!
customer_reviews.text: First HTC phone and it is exactly what I expected, excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Matt. C

customer_reviews.title: HTC enough said
customer_reviews.text: love the HTC brand, this is my 3rd one. Others were passed on to friends, not broke :)
customer_reviews.author: Kirmit

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Feel
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, quick and responsive. Only con is that I have a problem connecting to some bluetooth speakers but that could be just me doing something wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. S. J. Parkes

customer_reviews.title: but haven't been disappointed. Great camera despite various reviews
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit of research and a little concerned not latest model, but haven't been disappointed. Great camera despite various reviews, and the sound reproduction is fantastic which is the main reason I got it. Stunning, unique look.
customer_reviews.author: bootleg

customer_reviews.title: Phone won't work without a battery
customer_reviews.text: Phone was a sim free grade b phone as described by sellers Unfortunately the battery was fully gone and had to be replaced at an extra cost
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not that great.
customer_reviews.text: I've got this phone since one year and half now. The sound is amazing, pictures are great as well (when you know how to use properly the camera). The screen is ok not crazy but it's all right. The main problem is the battery. I have to charge my phone at least two or three times a day. At this price I wasn't expecting that.
customer_reviews.author: Hugues

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I updated from the HTC 9 to this one, and I am impressed so far....
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Crashed after four months of use and needed to go ...
customer_reviews.text: Crashed after four months of use and needed to go back for repair, not very impressed. My HTC 1Max was a much nicer phone and lasted five years without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life really good. The only thing I did not expect is ...
customer_reviews.text: my third HTC phone and it did not let me down. Met all my expectations. Battery life really good. The only thing I did not expect is the charger to be different from the other Android phones. Other than this, it is an excellent phone and highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this for a friend
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a friend but they seem to love it - SO 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Chris A.

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever !
customer_reviews.text: As expected great phone at great price. Bought this to replace Samsung s7 as I just did not get on with the Samsung. Arrived on time well packaged no issues so far and none expected. Had HTC phones in past and loved them this is no exception. Searched the net could not find this cheaper anywhere thought it was too good to be true but I was so wrong!! Great product so much better than s7 or iPhone. Highly recommended .
customer_reviews.author: glen skinner

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect 10
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from xperia z5 and a samsung a8. Both phones were lovely but this kills the both. The os is so slick, it just works. Sound is phenomenal with headphones. Camera is good but not as good as the Sony. Fingerprint scanner is lightning fast. Screen superb. No lag at all. Great design. Overall, best phone I've had. Including iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Speeding Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Solid, fast phone with excellent audio
customer_reviews.text: Cracking phone. Fast and responsive. Sound quality is great and the HTC earphones supplied in the box offer good sound quality too. The phone also drives my Grado over the ear headphones well. If you want a phone that offers good audio then this is great. HTC have a really good reputation for sound quality. The screen is great and very little overly to the stock android experience which is nice. Phone feels really solid and well built. I have had it since the start of 2017 and not noticed any deterioration in speed. Battery life is also excellent and it comes with a quick charger so charges really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Dez Rogers

customer_reviews.title: CHECK CHARGING UNIT, IT MAY BE A FIRE HAZARD.
customer_reviews.text: Phone great. Plug Charger DANGEROUS!!!!!! When charging roughly under 60% charging unit charges phone but after a while red light goes out on phone and charging unit is Hot and if left gets TO HOT TO HANDLE possibly if left FIRE RISK. I found roughly after 60% the phone charged normally and charging unit didn't heat up at all. Seems OK I am referring to the unit I have that was in the box with the phone I purchased. The box and wrapping did not appear to have been opened before. I have contacted the seller but as yet not had a reply.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone for making hostage demands
customer_reviews.text: Came a lot quicker than was advertised, which was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Chaffro

customer_reviews.title: my fault this time
customer_reviews.text: brought this for my wife as I had accidently dropped a door hinge through her old (well a year old almost last M8 prior dropped in the 6foot deep pond) HTC 10 she is really happy with it and if your wife you should be too
customer_reviews.author: Mr Seagull

customer_reviews.title: i liked this phone
customer_reviews.text: i liked this phone, sadly the phone home button was touch so you would find the phone waking up in your pocket all the time, the button layout is weird, but it looks so pretty and handles like an S7
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HTC - The most underrated phone manufacturers.
customer_reviews.text: Can't give a full review, check YouTube for that. Product is great and I love HTC's as they're super reliable and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Abdi

customer_reviews.title: Such a shame...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the phone was faulty and had to be returned for a refund. The phone did not come with a UK plug. It had a battery fault within the first day, as it kept randomly shutting off while using any app. This was not due to updates etc. As I had updated it to the latest OS as soon as I got it. Disappointed but seller did refund in full, however I found them lacking in communication.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good but not perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The phone is made with perfect materials and assembly. It is gorgeous. Signal reception is good but not excellent (as the Huawei P9 or blackberry PRIV), as well as battery life. It can cover the working day with about 4 hours of heated screen. The capsule is great for audio. The sound from the speakers is good but I expected something better, especially with reference to the low frequencies. The system is very fluid and fast. Too bad that my phone has a TIANMA brand screen that presents the problem of white tending to pink. AMAZON delivery (in Italy), always perfect!
customer_reviews.author: dottnoce

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a replacement for an LG G4, ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for an LG G4, sadly it doesn't meet the quality of the previous device, even the 'much lauded' boomsound is in reality weak and feeble, sound reproduction is mushy, some sounds fail to be reproduced at all, just a mush that lacks definition. Even the ringtone is quiet. Also the way the device handles memory cards is somewhat irritating, given the choice to use it as photo storage or fully integrated with the system memory (and encrypted) so no more physical backup possible, media and photos are lost forever on this device..
customer_reviews.author: Cycling Richard

customer_reviews.title: Cautious enthusiasm
customer_reviews.text: Too early to assess properly. Size wll take a few days to get used to after a HTC One Mini and was confused by the set up appearing to be in Korean with no information about this in the phone packing. No easily discoverable Caps lock on keyboard. Battery life considerable improvement on the One Mini.
customer_reviews.author: JohnBDorset

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly for the drop test results (32 drops before the test phone broke). My last phone had 7 broken screens (Samsung Note 4) so durability is a big issue. The beautiful matt black finish gets a bit damaged when dropped but that's par for the course. It's still a thing of beauty and just lovely to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Birdy

customer_reviews.title: Clearly another superb HTC phone, a few small niggles ...
customer_reviews.text: Clearly another superb HTC phone, a few small niggles in the setting up, but a lovely phone that can't be faulted!
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone, the first time I ordered it from ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, the first time I ordered it from Amazon, there were deep scratched on the metal back casing. I returned it back. Amazon sent me another one, when it arrived, everything seemed fine. 2 days later I noticed deep scratches at the back again, this was almost impossible as the phone kept in my drawer, Mybe they sent me rejects...... Anyway, I still have my phone for a year now. Everything is fine but the scratches remain.
customer_reviews.author: Testing 1,2,3

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone was the perfect replacement for my aging S4. I had my doubts going back to a HTC, and this phone shattered those doubts. This phone easily lasts the whole day at work, and on the go, with between just below half of its battery and 10% when I plug it in for the night.
customer_reviews.author: Tonks M.

customer_reviews.title: Buy from a shop with decent technical support
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this phone, or at least purchase from a shop you can return it to! My phone doesnt ring and freezes constantly, rang amazon anf basically the advice is to factory reset, so if you want to loose your data everytime this could be perect otherwise avoid this product and amazons amazing technical advice
customer_reviews.author: kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Ok phone.
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone but not much different than the HTC m8.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN H.

customer_reviews.title: An awesome phone in a beautiful body
customer_reviews.text: One of the best android phones around. It's close (but not quite) to stock android, so you get the great android experience, with just a touch of elegance from HTC's Sense UI. This could easily be a stepping stone to owning and using a Nexus phone. The best part of the HTC 10 is the total lack of any bloatware. Zero, nil, none.
customer_reviews.author: Ho Yi

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had this phone for nine months and now it is black-tie don’t come on no more I’m going to return it back to Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This phone is the biggest piece of crap If it gets overheated it keeps freezing I’ve had this phone for nine months and now it is black-tie don’t come on no more I’m going to return it back to Amazon
customer_reviews.author: nicholas potter

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: This is not a sim free phone. It has three banding and the box had been previously opened so not even new?? Confused as none of this was in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phone and battery life
customer_reviews.text: Great phone and features!!! and i must say the batter life is AMAAAAZZING which is what i was hoping for. Well pleased with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: ndean786

customer_reviews.title: Can't imagine using anything else.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned 5 HTC phones and this is the best one so far. Love it. After having it for 2 months it got stolen so I am repurchasing the same one. Can't imagine using anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone v
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with this phone. Larger than I expected. But I had not read dimensions and the larger size does make it easier to read.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent...
customer_reviews.text: Just the phone plain and simple, speedy delivery, although the Oreo update has ruined the battery life on the phone and this was a huge let down for me on HTC's part but when returning a faulty phone for another model the customer service was splendid
customer_reviews.author: Suhail Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Amazing model
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mobile! everything is just absolutely high quality
customer_reviews.author: Maria E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I never bought a phone online before this but this one is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Vitsippa

customer_reviews.title: Underated phone, excellence personified
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to it ,so far it's all good, fast and precise,will report on my findings when I am used to it
customer_reviews.author: john D.

customer_reviews.title: HTC 10
customer_reviews.text: HTC 10 direct replacement, like for like so very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: mondo

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third HTC and I love it. Best yet. SIM free and extremly well made. Headphones were included and give great quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: GMcD

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone! Interface is smooth as butter as opposed ...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant phone! Interface is smooth as butter as opposed to the UI of all the other non stock android phones out there. Build quality is exceptional. Battery life is really good and it charges quickly Fingerprint scanner is quick and reliable. Camera is Brilliant. Display is clear and bright. HTC knows how to create a good overall package. Highly recommended. Make sure you buy from Amazon (as supplier) directly to ensure you are getting an unlocked, sealed, brand new phone.
customer_reviews.author: M Hof.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing, I had a HTC M8 before this and ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing, I had a HTC M8 before this and loved it so I stuck with HTC with for upgrade and I'm glad I did, works perfectly and even though I've dropped it an uncountable amount of times it still works properly and the dents and scratches are non existent. I would definitely recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Well Chuffed :-)
customer_reviews.text: As already said in other reviews this is a great piece of kit. It is also a great deal from Amazon & O2. By changing my tariff when ordering I basically have a phone worth £570 for £168 over 2 years plus the £10 cost. Well Chuffed :-)
customer_reviews.author: Alan-D

customer_reviews.title: Really good phone. As usual HTC have done really good ...
customer_reviews.text: I've just returned my Sony XZ and bought HTC10. Really good phone. As usual HTC have done really good job!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: I like the cleaner face of the phone without the dual ...
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from an HTC 9 and this is absolutely in a different league. I like the cleaner face of the phone without the dual speakers (although they were excellent in themselves), and the fingerprint scanner is a welcome addition as is the slightly larger and clearer screen.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: A good, solid phone with good performance
customer_reviews.text: A good, solid phone with good performance. A good upgrade from my LG G3. I really like this phone, I just wish I could love it as much as my G3.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, love the build quality of HTC but glitchy, unreliable and slow. Settings change by themselves, numbers fall out of speed dials on a regular basis. Text prediction just doesn't work. Had HTC befire, loved them, this one is the worst and the last. Wouldn't recommend and will definitely be replacing as soon as i can afford to get rid ...
customer_reviews.author: MRS MEGAN PATRICK

customer_reviews.title: Good phone. 3 major bad points over the M8 ...
customer_reviews.text: Good phone. 3 major bad points over the M8 though: - Screen is no way near as bright and is a bloody pain. You can never see anything! - no IR blaster - battery life is rubbish. I used to charge my M8 once a day. This goes through 1.5 charges per day!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Classic megacorp!
customer_reviews.text: HTC are now on my list just like Samsung are. Who gives a toss about the consumer; we're going to bake-in Facebook (and other crapware) to the phone so you can't remove it. Also this stupid, stupid phone has a "HTC Outlook Sync" calendar on it that, again, can't be removed which means it acts as your DEFAULT calendar. Absolutely crazy! So many things wrong with this phone when you actually come to use it. HTC need to take a long hard look at themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D

product_meta.title: HTC 10 SIM-Free Smartphone - Carbon Grey
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Carbon GreyHTC 10. It's more of what you're looking for in a flagship phone. Unparalleled performance. Superb 24-bit Hi-Res sound. The world's first Optical Image Stabilisation in both front and back cameras. And one of the highest smartphone camera rankings ever from DxOMark. All in a beautifully crafted metal unibody.

BOX CONTAINS
HTC M10, Micro USB Cable, Mains Adaptor, Headphones, Documentation
feature_bullets: 3000 mAh battery combines with PowerBotics, which improves battery life by 30%, to deliver up to 2 days extra battery life
32GB internal memory and a slot for a microSDXC card up to 2TB
Main Camera; OIS-enabled 12MP UltraPixel camera. Front Camera; OIS-enabled 5MP UltraSelfie camera with UltraPixel technology for sharp, clear selfies in any light.
